sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../css/TermsOfUse.css'; function FAQ() { return (

1. What is AZAL-Miles?
     AZAL-Miles is the frequent flyer programme of Azerbaijan Airlines. AZAL-Miles programme members can earn travel points and status points by flying on Azerbaijan Airlines and Buta Airways.


2. What are travel points?
     Travel points can be earned by members whenever they travel with tickets purchased and used on the flights of Azerbaijan Airlines or Buta Airways , and also when using the services of partners. Travel points are earned for every euro (â‚¬) of the base fare of the tickets (base fare - is the fare of the ticket excluding taxes and surcharges).
Travel points can be used to pay for reward tickets on scheduled flights of Azerbaijan Airlines.


3. What are status points?
    Status points are collected on flights with Azerbaijan Airlines or Buta Airways, they cannot be exchanged for anything. They serve for upgrade/maintain membership statuses. Status points are earned on each flight; the value of status points is based on the destination and the class of travel.


4. What are bonus travel points?
    Bonus travel points are the extra travel points that you earn once you upgrade from Classic membership to Gold or Platinum. Gold members earn an additional 100% and Platinum members earn an additional 200% of points, these additional points are identified within the membership statement as bonus travel points. These points are exactly the same as travel points; they have the same value and validity.


5. Are there flights where I do not receive travel and status points?
    You cannot earn points on flights that are operated by other airlines, for charter flights or reward flights.


6. How do I qualify for higher levels of membership within the AZAL-Miles programme?
    Earning status points in a membership year is the way to upgrade your membership status, the more status points you earn, the higher level of your membership will be.

); }; export default FAQ;
